text: Elizabeth Anne "Lizzy" Caplan (born June 30, 1982) is an American television and movie actress. She has played many roles. She played Janis Ian in Mean Girls, Marlena Diamond in Cloverfield and Gena in Bachelorette. She also played Amy Burley in the show True Blood. Since 2013 she has played Virginia E. Johnson in Masters of Sex. She was born in Los Angeles to a Jewish family. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:1982 births Category:Living people
title: Lizzy Caplan
